snippet: Gregory Wasson will step down after the country’s largest drugstore retailer completes its acquisition of the British pharmacy chain Alliance Boots.
abstract: Gregory D Wasson, president and chief executive of Walgreen, will retire after company completes its acquisition of Alliance Boots.
lead_paragraph: Gregory Wasson will step down after the country’s largest drugstore retailer completes its acquisition of the British pharmacy chain Alliance Boots.

headline.main: After Merger, Chief to Leave Walgreen
headline.print_headline: After Merger, Chief to Leave Walgreen
